name: The Ballad of Kylie Jenner’s Old Face presented by Jayde Adams

shows.title: The Ballad of Kylie Jenner’s Old Face presented by Jayde Adams
shows.desc:
In 2019 how do you become a ‘successful independent woman person’? In her Serious Black Jumper™ Jayde thinks she knows. Join her as she rifles through all the noise and self-promotion to figure out what’s actually going on.

She’s a comedian currently all over the TV screen and now all over Greenbelt. “Jayde Adams is a star.” said The Guardian. And who are we to disagree?

Age recommendation: 12+
Running Time: 60 mins
